Package bll

Class OrderBLL

java.lang.Object
bll.OrderBLL
public class OrderBLL
extends java.lang.Object
The type Order bll - business logic for order - validates the order to be added/updated into the database or for delete it ensures that it exists.
Author:
Ariana Horvath

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    OrderBLL()
    Instantiates a new Order bll.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void createBill​(Order order, Product product, Client client)
    Create bill for the order - writes in a .txt file different for each order.
    void deleteOrder​(int id)
    Delete order if it exists, if so it increments the product stock with the quantity from deleted order.

    Gets client dao.

    Gets validator.
    Order insertOrder​(Order order)
    Insert order order if it is valid, has enough products in stock and creates the bill for the inserted order.

    • deleteOrder

      public void deleteOrder​(int id)
      Delete order if it exists, if so it increments the product stock with the quantity from deleted order.
      Parameters:
      id - the id

    • updateOrder

      public void updateOrder​(Order order, int id)
      Update order if the new order is valid and there are enough products in stock. Updates the product stock also.
      Parameters:
      order - the order
      id - the id
